00049 //
00050 // AnchorTextWriter
00051 //
00052 // 20 May 2004 -- tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_ANCHORTEXTWRITER_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_ANCHORTEXTWRITER_HPP
00057 
00058 #include <iostream>
00059 #include <algorithm>
00060 #include "indri/Path.hpp"
00061 #include "lemur/lemur-compat.hpp"
00062 
00063 class AnchorTextWriter : public ObjectHandler<ParsedDocument> {
00064 private:
00065   std::ofstream _out;
00066 
00067 public:
00068   AnchorTextWriter( const std::string& outputPath ) {
00069     std::string directory = Path::directory( outputPath );
00070     Path::make( directory );
00071     _out.open( outputPath.c_str(), std::ios::out );
00072   }
00073 
00074   ~AnchorTextWriter() {
00075     _out.close();
00076   }
00077 
00078   void handle( ParsedDocument* document ) {
00079     greedy_vector<MetadataPair>::iterator iter;
00080 
00081     iter = std::find_if( document->metadata.begin(),
00082                          document->metadata.end(),
00083                          MetadataPair::key_equal( "DOCNO" ) );
00084 
00085     const char* docno = (char*)iter->value;
00086 
00087     iter = std::find_if( document->metadata.begin(),
00088                          document->metadata.end(),
00089                          MetadataPair::key_equal( "URL" ) );
00090 
00091     const char* page = (char*)iter->value;
00092     const char* url = 0;
00093     int count = 0;
00094     int urlEnd = -1;
00095 
00096     // find the third slash, which should occur
00097     // right after the domain name
00098     char* slash = 0;
00099     if(page)  slash = strchr( page, '/' );
00100     if(slash) slash = strchr( slash+1, '/' );
00101     if(slash) slash = strchr( slash+1, '/' );
00102 
00103     int domainLength;
00104     if( slash )
00105       domainLength = slash - page;
00106     else
00107       domainLength = strlen(page);
00108 
00109     // count links
00110     for( unsigned int i=0; i<document->tags.size(); i++ ) {
00111       TagExtent& extent = document->tags[i];
00112 
00113       // we only extract absolute urls
00114       if( !strcmp( extent.name, "absolute-url" ) ) {
00115         url = document->terms[ extent.begin ];
00116         urlEnd = extent.end;
00117 
00118         // if it has the same domain, throw it out
00119         if( url && page && !lemur_compat::strncasecmp( url, page, domainLength ) ) {
00120           url = 0;
00121           urlEnd = -1;
00122         }
00123       } else if( !strcmp( extent.name, "a" ) &&  // this is anchor text
00124                  url &&                          // we've seen a url
00125                  urlEnd == extent.begin &&       // this text is associated with an absolute-url
00126                  extent.end - extent.begin > 0 ) // there is some text here
00127       {
00128         count++;
00129         url = 0;
00130       }
00131     }
00132 
00133     // print output
00134     _out << "DOCNO=" << docno << std::endl;
00135     _out << "DOCURL=" << page << std::endl;
00136     _out << "LINKS=" << count << std::endl;
00137     url = 0;
00138     urlEnd = -1;
00139 
00140     for( unsigned int i=0; i<document->tags.size(); i++ ) {
00141       TagExtent& extent = document->tags[i];
00142 
00143       if( !strcmp( extent.name, "absolute-url" ) ) {  // this is an absolute url
00144         url = document->terms[ extent.begin ];
00145         urlEnd = extent.end;
00146 
00147         // if it has the same domain, throw it out
00148         if( url && page && !lemur_compat::strncasecmp( url, page, domainLength ) ) {
00149           url = 0;
00150           urlEnd = -1;
00151         }
00152       } else if( !strcmp( extent.name, "a" ) &&  // this is anchor text
00153                  url &&                          // we've seen a url
00154                  urlEnd == extent.begin &&       // this text is associated with an absolute-url
00155                  extent.end - extent.begin > 0 ) // there is some text here
00156       {
00157         int textLength = 0;
00158 
00159         _out << "LINKURL=" << url << std::endl;
00160         _out << "TEXT=\"";
00161         for( unsigned int j=extent.begin; j < extent.end && textLength < 60000; j++ ) {
00162           if( !document->terms[j] )
00163             continue;
00164 
00165           textLength += strlen(document->terms[j])+1;
00166           _out << document->terms[j] << " ";
00167         }
00168         _out << "\"" << std::endl;
00169 
00170         // only do the same link once
00171         url = 0;
00172       }
00173     }
00174   }
00175 };
00176 
00177 #endif // INDRI_ANCHORTEXTWRITER_HPP
